**What do cybersecurity marketing agencies do?**
Cybersecurity marketing agencies specialize in promoting security products and services. They understand the technical nature of cybersecurity offerings and can effectively communicate value propositions to CISOs, IT managers, and business decision-makers.

**Why hire a cybersecurity-specific marketing agency?**
Cybersecurity marketing agencies have specialized knowledge of the security industry, understand technical product features, and know how to reach security decision-makers. They're familiar with compliance requirements, industry terminology, and the unique sales cycles of security products.
